```{r}
test <- "HASH"

compute_hash <- function(string) {
  cur_val <- 0
  for (s in str_split_1(string, "")) {
    cur_val <- ((cur_val + utf8ToInt(s)) * 17) %% 256
    #message(s, " ", utf8ToInt(s), " val ", cur_val)
  }
  cur_val
}

compute_hash(test)
# expect 52

```


## Part 1

```{r}
map_int(input, compute_hash) |> sum()
```
